channel.title: vim on Blog and reference
channel.description: Recent content in vim on Blog and reference

item.title: My $Myvimrc
item.description: set nocompatible source $VIMRUNTIME/vimrc_example.vim source $VIMRUNTIME/mswin.vim behave mswin set guifont=Consolas:h12:cANSI syntax on colorscheme murphy set backupdir=c:\temp set directory=c:\temp set undodir=c:\temp set spellfile=C:\matt\bin\markdown.latin1.add set ignorecase let mapleader = "," map <Leader>d :%s/xxTodaysDate/\=strftime('%d %B %Y')<CR> map <Leader>t .,$Tab /, " map <Leader>b <Esc>I<li><Esc>A</li><Esc> map <Leader>m o### xxxTitle<Cr><Cr>```<Cr>xxxContent<Cr>```<Esc>?xxx<Cr>C map xxq I<blockquote><Esc> map xqx A</blockquote><Esc> map xxl I<li><Esc>A</li><Esc>
